column5: I have land that is reasonably secure, and would like to use it as a storage area. What is a reasonable amount to charge for a period from Oct 15 - April 15?
Check to see how much more you will have to pay for insurance first!!
if its outdoor, the going rate is 40$/month
Wow how fortuitous. I'm looking for a place to store my boat for 5 months..Nov-Mar.

Albert,  As Rick says, you need to look at insurance first... Last thing you need is someone suing you if something happens to their equipment while in you're care. You will also need a contract written up for you're clients to sign... which will probably involve the hiring of a lawyer to draw it up to cover all the bases...  you are right though.. you have a great spot to do it!  G
I would say if its boats being stored.....5-7 guaranteed fishing trips from the boat owners the next summer!
The other option I have is to say that if the boat is not gone by such and such a date.....it's mine.
